instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 2015 A1534 MacBook Retina 12" - No Output Devices Found
threads.message: I have a fully functional 2015 A1534 that loses sound when I put it all back together. It comes up No Output Devices Found. If I take it apart the sound works again. Any ideas? Everything looks normal, no pinched cables or anything like that.

threads.title: 2015 A1534 MacBook Retina 12" - No Output Devices Found
threads.message: Bad flat cable to the audio board.
